mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.certificate_type_code AS "certificateTypeCode", a.certificate_type_name AS "certificateTypeName", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.effective_date AS "effectiveDate", a.description AS "description", a.owner_type AS "ownerType", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o4.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o4 ON o4.id = a.office_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM certificate_type a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.certificate_type_code LIKE '%'||#{certificateTypeCode}||'%' '%'+#{certificateTypeCode}+'%' concat('%',#{certificateTypeCode},'%')
AND a.certificate_type_name LIKE '%'||#{certificateTypeName}||'%' '%'+#{certificateTypeName}+'%' concat('%',#{certificateTypeName},'%')
AND a.office_id LIKE '%'||#{office.id}||'%' '%'+#{office.id}+'%' concat('%',#{office.id},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO certificate_type( id, certificate_type_code, certificate_type_name, office_id, effective_date, description, owner_type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{certificateTypeCode}, #{certificateTypeName}, #{office.id}, #{effectiveDate}, #{description}, #{ownerType}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE certificate_type SET certificate_type_code = #{certificateTypeCode}, certificate_type_name = #{certificateTypeName}, office_id = #{office.id}, effective_date = #{effectiveDate}, description = #{description}, owner_type = #{ownerType}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
